data.title: Tech Brief:SMARTONE CHIEF RETURNS
data.meta_description: SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd., the third-largest Hong Kong cell-phone operator, appointed Douglas Li as its chief executive. Mr. Li, who served as SmarTone's founding CEO from 1992 to 1996, succeeds Ian Stone, who is leaving "to pursue ot
data.text: SmarTone Telecommunications Holdings Ltd., the third-largest Hong Kong cell-phone operator, appointed Douglas Li as its chief executive. Mr. Li, who served as SmarTone's founding CEO from 1992 to 1996, succeeds Ian Stone, who is leaving "to pursue other career opportunities," the company said.
